overview:
Founder - GyanFinder Social Training network and Gyan Web Solutions Pvt Ltd.

Result oriented and committed Software Engineer with 9 plus years of experience in Architecture, Analysis, Design, Development, Deployment, Re-Engineering, Coding and Testing of Web Applications.

Overall 9 years of experience as a Information Technology professional. Working expertise in PHP, XML, HTML, DHTML, Apache Web Server, JavaScript. Highly experienced in developing Client Server Web Applications using LAMP, WAMP Technologies. Highly experienced with Drupal Content Management System. Implemented Apache Solr Search Engine with Web Applications. Proficient in data base programming using SQL, PL/SQL and stored procedures. Effectively worked on Healthcare, Educational, Research Oriented and Commercial Domains. Developed and managed complex databases with very large tables having several thousands of records. Involved in optimizing Queries in MySQL to avoid time-out issues and better performance while handling large volumes of data. Experienced with SCRUM Process. Certified Scrum Team member.

degrees.degree_type: Post Graduate Certficate in Information Systems
degrees.subject: Information Systems
